name: Mines of Minia
description: You are Gizmo, an indentured robot sent to work in the Mines of Minia by the Overbearer.  An industrial accident has short-circuited your inhibitor, and you have found your freedom in the depths of the mines.  You have memories of the surface, your life before you were sold to the Overbearer and put to work in the mines.  You yearn to find your freedom and are set to make your way to the surface.  To get there, you will need to explore, discover, and gear up to face off against fellow indentured bots and other denizens of the deep before finally facing off against the Overbearer himself.
